citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:04 a.m. on
October 24, 2024. The inspector contacted the licensee by phone and was informed no responsible adult would be
available within the next hour to walk the inspector through the inspection process. Failure to provide access to the
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result
in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:04 a.m. on 
October 24, 2024. The inspector contacted the licensee by phone and was informed no responsible adult would be 
available within the next hour to walk the inspector through the inspection process. Failure to provide access to the 
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result 
in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
